Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

10  const int KSWriteASCII::fBufferSize = 64000;
11  const int KSWriteASCII::fSplitLevel = 99;
12  const string KSWriteASCII::fLabel = string( "KASSIOPEIA_TREE_DATA" );

14  KSWriteASCII::Data::Objekt::Objekt(KSComponent* aComponent, string aType, int aPrecision)
15  {
16  fComponent = aComponent;
17  fType = aType;
18  fPrecision = aPrecision;
19  }
20 
21  string KSWriteASCII::Data::Objekt::getValue() {
22 
23  stringstream s;
24  s << std::setprecision(fPrecision);
25  if(fType== "string")
26  s << *(fComponent->As< string >()) << "\t";
27  else if(fType == (string)"bool")
28  s << *(fComponent->As< bool >()) << "\t";
29  else if(fType == (string)"unsigned char")
30  s << *(fComponent->As< unsigned char >()) << "\t";
31  else if(fType ==(string) "char")
32  s << *(fComponent->As< char >()) << "\t";
33  else if(fType ==(string) "unsigned short")
34  s << *(fComponent->As< unsigned short >()) << "\t";
35  else if(fType == (string)"unsigned int")
36  s << *(fComponent->As< unsigned int >()) << "\t";
37  else if(fType == (string)"unsigned long")
38  s << *(fComponent->As< unsigned long >()) << "\t";
39  else if(fType ==(string) "long")
40  s << *(fComponent->As< long >()) << "\t";
41  else if(fType ==(string) "int")
42  s << *(fComponent->As< int >()) << "\t";
43  else if(fType == (string)"short")
44  s << *(fComponent->As< short >()) << "\t";
45  else if(fType ==(string) "float")
46  s << *(fComponent->As< float >()) << "\t";
47  else if(fType == (string)"double")
48  s << *(fComponent->As< double >()) << "\t";
49  else if(fType == (string) "KThreeVector")
50  s << fComponent->As< KThreeVector >()->X() << "\t" << fComponent->As< KThreeVector >()->Y() << "\t" << fComponent->As< KThreeVector >()->Z() << "\t";
51  else if(fType == (string)"KTwoVector")
52  s << fComponent->As< KTwoVector >()->X() << "\t" << fComponent->As< KTwoVector >()->Y() << "\t" ;
53  else
54  s << "\t" << "\t" ;
55 
56  return s.str();
57  }
58 
59  KSWriteASCII::Data::Data( KSComponent* aComponent ) :
60  fLabel( "" ),
61  fType( "" ),
62  fWriter(),
63  fIndex( 0 ),
64  fLength( 0 ),
65  fComponents()
66  {
67  MakeTitle( aComponent, 0 );
68  }
69 
70  KSWriteASCII::Data::Data( KSComponent* aComponent, KSWriteASCII* aWriter ) :
71  fLabel( "" ),
72  fType( "" ),
73  fIndex( 0 ),
74  fLength( 0 ),
75  fComponents()
76  {
77  fWriter = aWriter;
78  MakeTitle( aComponent, 0 );
79  }

81  KSWriteASCII::Data::~Data() {
82 
83  }
84 
85  void KSWriteASCII::Data::Start( const unsigned int& anIndex )
86  {
87  fIndex = anIndex;
88  fLength = 0;
89  return;
90  }
91 
92  void KSWriteASCII::Data::Fill()
93  {
94  KSComponent* tComponent;
95  Objekt* tObjekt;
96  vector< KSComponent* >::iterator tIt;
97 
98  for( tIt = fComponents.begin(); tIt != fComponents.end(); tIt++ )
99  {
100  tComponent = (*tIt);
101  tComponent->PullUpdate();
102  }
103 
104  string str;
105  for (vector< Objekt* >::iterator tIt = fObjekts.begin(); tIt != fObjekts.end(); tIt++ )
106  {
107  tObjekt = (*tIt);
108  str = string(tObjekt->getValue().c_str());
109 
110  for ( std::string::iterator it=str.begin(); it!=str.end(); ++it)
111  fWriter->TextFile()->File()->put(*it);
112  }
113  for( tIt = fComponents.begin(); tIt != fComponents.end(); tIt++ )
114  {
115  tComponent = (*tIt);
116  tComponent->PullDeupdate();
117  }
118 
119  fLength++;
120  return;
121  }
122 
123  void KSWriteASCII::Data::MakeTitle( KSComponent* aComponent, int aTrack )
124  {
125  wtrmsg_debug( "making title for object <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom )
126 
127  KSComponentGroup* tComponentGroup = aComponent->As< KSComponentGroup >();
128  if( tComponentGroup != NULL )
129  {
130  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a group" << eom )
131  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tComponentGroup->ComponentCount(); tIndex++ )
132  MakeTitle( tComponentGroup->ComponentAt( tIndex ), aTrack );
133 
134  return;
135  }
136 
137  string* tString = aComponent->As< string >();
138  if( tString != NULL )
139  {
140  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a string" << eom )
141  string* str = new string((aComponent->GetName() + '\t').c_str());
142 
143  for ( std::string::iterator it=str->begin(); it!=str->end(); ++it)
144  fWriter->TextFile()->File()->put(*it);
145 
146  if (aTrack==0){
147  Objekt* obj = new Objekt(aComponent, "string", fWriter->Precision());
148  fObjekts.push_back(obj);
149 
150  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
151  }
152 
153  return;
154  }
155 
156  KTwoVector* tTwoVector = aComponent->As< KTwoVector >();
157  if( tTwoVector != NULL )
158  {
159  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a two_vector" << eom )
160  string* str = new string((aComponent->GetName() + string( "_x" ) + '\t' + aComponent->GetName() + string( "_y" ) + '\t').c_str());
161 
162  for ( std::string::iterator it=str->begin(); it!=str->end(); ++it)
163  fWriter->TextFile()->File()->put(*it);
164 
165  if (aTrack==0){
166  Objekt* obj = new Objekt(aComponent, "KTwoVector", fWriter->Precision());
167  fObjekts.push_back(obj);
168  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
169  }
170  return;
171  }
172 
173  KThreeVector* tThreeVector = aComponent->As< KThreeVector >();
174  if( tThreeVector != NULL )
175  {
176  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a three_vector" << eom )
177  string* str = new string((aComponent->GetName() + string( "_x" ) + '\t' + aComponent->GetName() + string( "_y" ) + '\t' + aComponent->GetName() + string( "_z" ) + '\t').c_str());
178 
179  for ( std::string::iterator it=str->begin(); it!=str->end(); ++it)
180  fWriter->TextFile()->File()->put(*it);
181 
182  if (aTrack==0){
183  Objekt* obj = new Objekt(aComponent, "KThreeVector", fWriter->Precision());
184  fObjekts.push_back(obj);
185 
186  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
187  }
188  return;
189  }
190 
191  bool* tBool = aComponent->As< bool >();
192  if( tBool != NULL )
193  {
194  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a bool" << eom )
195  string* str = new string((aComponent->GetName() + '\t').c_str());
196

198  fWriter->TextFile()->File()->put(*it);
199 
200  if (aTrack==0){

207  }

223  }
224  return;

394  KSWriteASCII::KSWriteASCII() :
395  fBase( "" ),
396  fPath( "" ),
397  fStepIteration( 1 ),
398  fStepIterationIndex( 0 ),
399  fTextFile( NULL ),
400  fRunComponents(),
401  fActiveRunComponents(),
402  fRunIndex( 0 ),
403  fRunFirstEventIndex( 0 ),
404  fRunLastEventIndex( 0 ),
405  fRunFirstTrackIndex( 0 ),
406  fRunLastTrackIndex( 0 ),
407  fRunFirstStepIndex( 0 ),
408  fRunLastStepIndex( 0 ),
409  fEventComponents(),
410  fActiveEventComponents(),
411  fEventIndex( 0 ),
412  fEventFirstTrackIndex( 0 ),
413  fEventLastTrackIndex( 0 ),
414  fEventFirstStepIndex( 0 ),
415  fEventLastStepIndex( 0 ),
416  fTrackComponents(),
417  fActiveTrackComponents(),
418  fTrackIndex( 0 ),
419  fTrackFirstStepIndex( 0 ),
420  fTrackLastStepIndex( 0 ),
421  fStepComponent( false ),
422  fStepComponents(),
423  fActiveStepComponents(),
424  fStepIndex( 0 )
425  {
426  fPrecision = std::cout.precision();
427  }

429  KSWriteASCII::KSWriteASCII( const KSWriteASCII& aCopy ) :
430  KSComponent(),
431  fBase( aCopy.fBase ),
432  fPath( aCopy.fPath ),
433  fStepIteration( aCopy.fStepIteration ),
434  fStepIterationIndex( 0 ),
435  fTextFile( NULL ),
436  fRunComponents(),
437  fActiveRunComponents(),
438  fRunIndex( 0 ),
439  fRunFirstEventIndex( 0 ),
440  fRunLastEventIndex( 0 ),
441  fRunFirstTrackIndex( 0 ),
442  fRunLastTrackIndex( 0 ),
443  fRunFirstStepIndex( 0 ),
444  fRunLastStepIndex( 0 ),
445  fEventComponents(),
446  fActiveEventComponents(),
447  fEventIndex( 0 ),
448  fEventFirstTrackIndex( 0 ),
449  fEventLastTrackIndex( 0 ),
450  fEventFirstStepIndex( 0 ),
451  fEventLastStepIndex( 0 ),
452  fTrackComponents(),
453  fActiveTrackComponents(),
454  fTrackIndex( 0 ),
455  fTrackFirstStepIndex( 0 ),
456  fTrackLastStepIndex( 0 ),
457  fStepComponent( false ),
458  fStepComponents(),
459  fActiveStepComponents(),
460  fStepIndex( 0 )
461  {
462  fPrecision = aCopy.Precision();
463  }

465  KSWriteASCII* KSWriteASCII::Clone() const
466  {
467  return new KSWriteASCII( *this );
468  }

470  KSWriteASCII::~KSWriteASCII(){
471 
472  }
473 
474  void KSWriteASCII::ExecuteRun()
475  {
476  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer <" << fName << "> is filling a run" << eom );
477 
478  if ( fEventIndex != 0 )
479  fRunLastEventIndex = fEventIndex - 1;
480 
481  if ( fTrackIndex != 0 )
482  fRunLastTrackIndex = fTrackIndex - 1;
483 
484  if ( fStepIndex != 0 )
485  fRunLastStepIndex = fStepIndex - 1;
486 
487  for( ComponentIt tIt = fActiveRunComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveRunComponents.end(); tIt++ )
488  tIt->second->Fill();
489 
490  fRunIndex++;
491  fRunFirstEventIndex = fEventIndex;
492  fRunFirstTrackIndex = fTrackIndex;
493  fRunFirstStepIndex = fStepIndex;
494 
495  return;
496  }
497 
498  void KSWriteASCII::ExecuteEvent()
499  {
500  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer <" << fName << "> is filling an event" << eom );
501 
502  if ( fTrackIndex != 0 )
503  fEventLastTrackIndex = fTrackIndex - 1;
504 
505  if ( fStepIndex != 0 )
506  fEventLastStepIndex = fStepIndex - 1;
507 
508  for( ComponentIt tIt = fActiveEventComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveEventComponents.end(); tIt++ )
509  tIt->second->Fill();
510 
511 
512  fEventIndex++;
513  fEventFirstTrackIndex = fTrackIndex;
514  fEventFirstStepIndex = fStepIndex;
515 
516  return;
517  }
518  void KSWriteASCII::ExecuteTrack()
519  {
520  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer <" << fName << "> is filling a track" << eom );
521 
522  if ( fStepIndex != 0 )
523  fTrackLastStepIndex = fStepIndex - 1;
524 
525  ComponentIt tIt;
526 
527  fTextFile->File()->put('\n');
528  for( ComponentIt tIt = fActiveTrackComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveTrackComponents.end(); tIt++ )
529  tIt->second->Fill();
530 
531  fTextFile->Close();
532  delete fTextFile;
533  stringstream s;
534  s << fBase << "_Track" << fTrackIndex+1 << + ".txt";
535  fTextFile = CreateOutputTextFile( s.str().c_str() );
536 
537 
538  if( !fPath.empty() )
539  fTextFile->AddToPaths( fPath );
540 
541 
542  if( fTextFile->Open( KFile::eWrite ) == true ){
543 
544  }
545 
546  for( tIt = fTrackComponents.begin(); tIt != fTrackComponents.end(); tIt++ )
547  tIt->second->MakeTitle(tIt->first,0);
548 
549  fTextFile->File()->put('\n');
550  for( tIt = fStepComponents.begin(); tIt != fStepComponents.end(); tIt++ )
551  tIt->second->MakeTitle(tIt->first, 1);
552 
553  fTrackIndex++;
554  fTrackFirstStepIndex = fStepIndex;
555 
556  return;
557  }
558  void KSWriteASCII::ExecuteStep()
559  {
560  if ( fStepIterationIndex % fStepIteration != 0 )
561  {
562  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer <" << fName << "> is skipping a step because of step iteration value <"<<fStepIteration<<">" << eom );
563  fStepIterationIndex++;
564  return;
565  }
566  fTextFile->File()->put('\n');
567  if( fStepComponent == true )
568  {
569  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer <" << fName << "> is filling a step" << eom );
570 
571  for( ComponentIt tIt = fActiveStepComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveStepComponents.end(); tIt++ )
572  tIt->second->Fill();
573  }
574 
575  fStepIndex++;
576  fStepIterationIndex++;
577 
578  return;
579  }
580 
581  void KSWriteASCII::AddRunComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
582  {
583  ComponentIt tIt = fRunComponents.find( aComponent );
584  if( tIt == fRunComponents.end() )
585  {
586  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer is making a new run output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
587 
588 
589  fKey = aComponent->GetName();
590 
591 
592  Data* tRunData = new Data( aComponent ,this);
593  tIt = fRunComponents.insert( ComponentEntry( aComponent, tRunData ) ).first;
594  }
595 
596  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer is starting a run output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
597 
598  tIt->second->Start( fRunIndex );
599  fActiveRunComponents.insert( *tIt );
600 
601  return;
602  }
603 
604  void KSWriteASCII::RemoveRunComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
605  {
606  ComponentIt tIt = fActiveRunComponents.find( aComponent );
607  if( tIt == fActiveRunComponents.end() )
608  {
609  wtrmsg( eError ) << "ASCII writer has no run output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
610  }
611 
612  fActiveRunComponents.erase( tIt );
613 
614  return;
615  }
616 
617  void KSWriteASCII::AddEventComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
618  {
619  ComponentIt tIt = fEventComponents.find( aComponent );
620  if( tIt == fEventComponents.end() )
621  {
622  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer is making a new event output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
623 
624  fKey = aComponent->GetName();
625 
626  Data* tEventData = new Data( aComponent,this );
627  tIt = fEventComponents.insert( ComponentEntry( aComponent, tEventData ) ).first;
628  }
629 
630  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer is starting a event output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
631 
632  tIt->second->Start( fEventIndex );
633  fActiveEventComponents.insert( *tIt );
634 
635  return;
636  }
637 
638  void KSWriteASCII::RemoveEventComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
639  {
640  ComponentIt tIt = fActiveEventComponents.find( aComponent );
641  if( tIt == fActiveEventComponents.end() )
642  {
643  wtrmsg( eError ) << "ASCII writer has no event output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
644  }
645 
646  fActiveEventComponents.erase( tIt );
647 
648  return;
649  }
650 
651  void KSWriteASCII::AddTrackComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
652  {
653 
654  ComponentIt tIt = fTrackComponents.find( aComponent );
655  if( tIt == fTrackComponents.end() )
656  {
657  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer is making a new track output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
658 
659  fKey = aComponent->GetName();
660 
661  Data* tTrackData = new Data( aComponent,this );
662  tIt = fTrackComponents.insert( ComponentEntry( aComponent, tTrackData ) ).first;
663  fTextFile->File()->put('\n');
664  }
665 
666  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer is starting a track output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
667 
668  tIt->second->Start( fTrackIndex );
669  fActiveTrackComponents.insert( *tIt );
670 
671  return;
672  }
673 
674  void KSWriteASCII::RemoveTrackComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
675  {
676  ComponentIt tIt = fActiveTrackComponents.find( aComponent );
677  if( tIt == fActiveTrackComponents.end() )
678  {
679  wtrmsg( eError ) << "ASCII writer has no track output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
680  }
681 
682  fActiveTrackComponents.erase( tIt );
683 
684  return;
685  }
686 
687  void KSWriteASCII::AddStepComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
688  {
689  if( fStepComponent == false )
690  fStepComponent = true;
691 
692  ComponentIt tIt = fStepComponents.find( aComponent );
693  if( tIt == fStepComponents.end() )
694  {
695  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer is making a new step output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
696 
697  fKey = aComponent->GetName();
698 
699  Data* tStepData = new Data( aComponent, this );
700 
701  tIt = fStepComponents.insert( ComponentEntry( aComponent, tStepData ) ).first;
702  }
703 
704  wtrmsg_debug( "ASCII writer is starting a step output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
705 
706  tIt->second->Start( fStepIndex );
707 
708  fActiveStepComponents.insert( *tIt );
709 
710  return;
711  }
712 
713  void KSWriteASCII::RemoveStepComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
714  {
715  ComponentIt tIt = fActiveStepComponents.find( aComponent );
716  if( tIt == fActiveStepComponents.end() )
717  {
718  wtrmsg( eError ) << "ASCII writer has no step output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
719  }
720 
721  fActiveStepComponents.erase( tIt );
722 
723  return;
724  }
725 
726  void KSWriteASCII::InitializeComponent()
727  {
728  wtrmsg_debug( "starting ASCII writer" << eom );
729  stringstream s;
730  s << fBase << "_Track" << fTrackIndex << + ".txt";
731  fTextFile = CreateOutputTextFile( s.str().c_str() );
732 
733  if( !fPath.empty() )
734  fTextFile->AddToPaths( fPath );
735 
736 
737  if( fTextFile->Open( KFile::eWrite ) == true ){
738 
739  }
740 
741  return;
742  }
743 
744  void KSWriteASCII::DeinitializeComponent()
745 
746  {
747  ComponentIt tIt;
748 
749  for( tIt = fTrackComponents.begin(); tIt != fTrackComponents.end(); tIt++ )
750  delete tIt->second;
751 
752  for( tIt = fStepComponents.begin(); tIt != fStepComponents.end(); tIt++ )
753  delete tIt->second;
754 
755  fTextFile->Close();
756 
757  delete fTextFile;
758  return;
759  }
760 
761  STATICINT sKSWriteASCIIDict =
762  KSDictionary< KSWriteASCII >::AddCommand( &KSWriteASCII::AddRunComponent, &KSWriteASCII::RemoveRunComponent, "add_run_output", "remove_run_output" ) +
763  KSDictionary< KSWriteASCII >::AddCommand( &KSWriteASCII::AddEventComponent, &KSWriteASCII::RemoveEventComponent, "add_event_output", "remove_event_output" ) +
764  KSDictionary< KSWriteASCII >::AddCommand( &KSWriteASCII::AddTrackComponent, &KSWriteASCII::RemoveTrackComponent, "add_track_output", "remove_track_output" ) +
765  KSDictionary< KSWriteASCII >::AddCommand( &KSWriteASCII::AddStepComponent, &KSWriteASCII::RemoveStepComponent, "add_step_output", "remove_step_output" );
766 }
